verses.verse: <S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H2088>'This<s%> is <S%H1697>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H376>"Any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7819>slaughters<s%> an <S%H7794>ox,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H3775>lamb,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5795>goat<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7819>slaughters<s%> it <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%>

and has not <S%H935>brought<s%> it to the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> to <S%H7126>present<s%> [it] as an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%> is to be <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> to that <S%H376>man.<s%> He has <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> and that <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H9415>people.<s%>

"The <S%H4616>reason<s%> is <S%H4616>so<s%> that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they were <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field,<s%> that they may <S%H935>bring<s%> them in to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> them as <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and <S%H6999>offer<s%> up the <S%H2459>fat<s%> in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> as a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> to the <S%H8163>goat<s%> <S%H9618>demons<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H2181>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> shall be a <S%H5769>permanent<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> to them throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>"'

"Then you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H376>'Any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or from the <S%H1616>aliens<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them, <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>offers<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%>

and does not <S%H935>bring<s%> it to the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> to <S%H6213>offer<s%> it to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> also shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H9415>people.<s%>

'And <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or from the <S%H1616>aliens<s%> who <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them, <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> I will <S%H5414>set<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H5315>person<s%> who <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and will <S%H3772>cut<s%> him <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H9415>people.<s%>

'For the <S%H5315>life<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is in the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and I have <S%H5414>given<s%> it to you on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls;<s%> for it is the <S%H1818>blood<s%> by reason of the <S%H5315>life<s%> that <S%H3722>makes<s%> <S%H3722>atonement.<s%>'

<S%H5921>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>'No<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> may any <S%H1616>alien<s%> who <S%H1481>sojourns<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>'

"So when <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or from the <S%H1616>aliens<s%> who <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them, in <S%H6718>hunting<s%> <S%H6679>catches<s%> a <S%H9130>beast<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5775>bird<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> may be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> he shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out its <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H3680>cover<s%> it with <S%H6083>earth.<s%>

"For [as for the] <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> is [identified] with its <S%H5315>life.<s%> Therefore I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'You are not to <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is its <S%H1818>blood;<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> it shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%>'

"And when <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> [an animal] <S%H5038>which<s%> <S%H5038>dies,<s%> or is <S%H2966>torn<s%> [by beasts], whether he is a <S%H249>native<s%> or an <S%H1616>alien,<s%> he shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H2930>remain<s%> <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening;<s%> then he will <S%H2891>become<s%> <S%H2891>clean.<s%>
"But <S%H518>if<s%> he does not <S%H3526>wash<s%> [them] or <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>body,<s%> then he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>guilt.<s%>"
